title: Puma Ocean Racing font.
content:
hello. i'm trying to figure out the font used for the "puma ocean racing" seen [here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235406/http:/pumaoceanracing.com/#EN/)

\*edited to attach picture.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235406im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puma2_4874.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235406im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puma1_3832.jpg)
author: the fuzz

comments.content:
i found this image on the site as well, and it looks like they've used a different font for it than the logo. the "p"s, along with the lower case s, look different. any idea for either? thanks again, everyone.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235406im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puma3_6416.jpg)
The scripts are most likely custom.
